column1: Education Section: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science. Experience Section: Coded and developed new solutions and maintained existing program code, Executed web technologies and maintained project related documentation, Provided technical support during design and code reviews for functional changes, Maintained and customized CMS platforms and Linux servers, Created new web applications and features and monitored legacy code, Prepared existing CMS platforms and documented content archival systems, Implemented application infrastructure components and resolved platform problems, Supported data designing, server administration and website integration services. Skills Section: Ruby, PHP, APEX, HTML, CSS, Javascript, C++, Java, ssl, xss, sql injection, SilverStripe, Codelgniter, Sumfony, Web design principles, Firewall and network security, Internet database connectivity, Common relational database concepts, Git, Subversion, MySQL, Oracle, NoSQL.
